name: Blueberry Space Cake
description: Blueberry Space Cake by Cresco Labs is the indica-dominant offspring of Outer Space and Alien Dutchess, with its Alien OG and Trinity lineage bearing the strongest influence on its effects and morphology. It offers heavier than average Kush-forward effects that include cerebral euphoria and relaxed, weighted limbs. This strain exhibits a strong berry and citrus aroma and could be utilized for stress relief, minor physical pain, and restlessness.
descriptionPlain: Blueberry Space Cake by Cresco Labs is the indica-dominant offspring of Outer Space and Alien Dutchess, with its Alien OG and Trinity lineage bearing the strongest influence on its effects and morphology. It offers heavier than average Kush-forward effects that include cerebral euphoria and relaxed, weighted limbs. This strain exhibits a strong berry and citrus aroma and could be utilized for stress relief, minor physical pain, and restlessness.

highlightedReviews.text: This strain gives you a couch lock while making your arms and legs almost feel numb. Great pain relief for migraines as well. This is one of my new favorite strains.

Blueberry Space Cake is. CRESO HOME RUN!!!!!
This is in there RESERVE collection along wi5 other flavors like Holiet Jake etc.
Blueberry Space Cake is one of those strains that IF you,re lucky to find it BUY IT....or I WILL WHEN I FIND IT!!!
I suffer from neuro pain in spine in arms. Legs, ribs back, have had 18 heart procedures n heart attacks so let’s just say I need to be calm and try to find some good in what she been a horrible 20 years.
This strain similar to BLUEBERRY has a little more control, u can take two boats, loose. That anxiety n your cool, or maybe it was a BAD DAY....ya got a headache, back hurts take a shower get in bed n just nurse this like a kid with a BLOW POP! 

before ya know it.....you’re OK.....it is a bit more expensive for thE CRESCO RESERVES but IMO worth it....not always about THC content, fresh terpenes, etc make for a wonderful fresh tasting concentrate!

if ya see this again I suggest you pick it up.....cause if I find it, I’ll buy it......strains like those ARE equal to an OPIOD just more expensive...but who cares, it’s our money!    

Finally us children of the WOODSTOCK GENERATION HAVE A CHOICE AND A VOICE!!!!

Enjoy this....thanks CRESCO 
Voodoo Idol
